yourshop_details_notice: Take advantage of this personalized offer before time runs out!
yourshop_reminder_notice: Reveal mystery discounts on skins & champions. See something you like? Be sure to pick it up before time runs out! These discounts are only available here.
yourshop_general_error_body: Sorry, we were unable to complete your purchase. Please try again in a few moments or contact Player Support for help.
yourshop_disabled_error_body: Sorry, Your Shop is currently closed. Please check again later!
yourshop_not_full: * Fewer than 6 offers are shown if most eligible content has already been unlocked
yourshop_details_purchase_confirmation_t: I have read the {{confirmationLink}} and agree to it.
yourshop_details_post_purchase_confirmat: You may check your purchase through [Store > History of Purchase]. Click HERE to see the Notification related to the following purchase. Please confirm the information above. Thank you for the purchase.
yourshop_show_offers_error_text: You did it. You bamboozled Discount Bot. It looks like you own every possible skin eligible for Your Shop offers. If you don’t own a lot of skins, and you think you are seeing this message in error, please reach out to Player Support.
yourshop_not_available_error_text: Your Shop is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later. If you are still having issues get in touch with Player Support with a screenshot of this error message.
yourshop_external_error_text: We can’t access the store right now. Please try again later. If you are still having issues get in touch with Player Support with a screenshot of this error message
yourshop_generic_error_text: Something went wrong while trying to access Your Shop. Please try again later. If you are still having issues get in touch with Player Support with a screenshot of this error message
yourshop_tencent_data_usage_modal_text_1: Your Shop would like to use your personal game data to generate skin offers that are more in line with your game habits. If you reject the query, you will be offered random skins.
yourshop_tencent_data_usage_modal_text_2: The data will be only used in this activity.
yourshop_tencent_data_usage_modal_link_t: Your Shop personal game data usage
yourshop_tencent_reminder_notice: Click to reveal mystery discounts on skins & champions. See something you like? Be sure to pick it up before time runs out! These discounts are only available here.
